thread.title: Kentucky accuses J&J of contributing to opioid epidemic

title: Kentucky accuses J&J of contributing to opioid epidemic
text:
April 18, 2018 / 2:51 PM / Updated 35 minutes ago Kentucky accuses J&J of contributing to opioid epidemic Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Kentuckyâ€™s attorney general on Wednesday sued Johnson & Johnson, accusing the pharmaceutical manufacturer of devising a deceptive marketing scheme that mischaracterized the risk of opioid abuse and addiction. 
The lawsuit by Kentucky Attorney General Andy Beshear was his fifth to date seeking to hold a drug manufacturer or distributor responsible for its role in the national opioid epidemic. Reporting by Nate Raymond in Boston
